document.title: Hot Topic: Assistance to Firefighters Grant Program (2006)
document.abstract: Grants are awarded each year on a competitive basis to applicants that address AFG program priorities, demonstrate financial need, and demonstrate the community benefit to be derived from their projects. Persistence is the key to successful funding.
